org.sonar.vary.plugin.utils

Class VaryReportSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sonar.vary.plugin.utils.VaryReportSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sonar.api.batch.CheckProject, org.sonar.api.batch.Sensor, org.sonar.api.BatchComponent, org.sonar.api.BatchExtension, org.sonar.api.Extension
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VaryCoverageSensor, VaryExternalRulesSensor, VaryXunitSensor

    public abstract class VaryReportSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.sonar.api.batch.Sensor
    This class is used as base for all sensors which import reports. It hosts common logic such as finding the reports and saving issues in SonarQube
